snippet: As part of the 2012-13 Neediest Cases campaign, The New York Times is catching up with some of the people who were profiled in recent campaigns.
lead_paragraph: As part of the 2012-13 Neediest Cases campaign, The New York Times is catching up with some of the people who were profiled in recent campaigns.
